text: ETA Creative Arts Foundation, founded in 1971, is an African-American theatre and art museum in Chicago. == References == == External links == * Official site * https://www.chicagoreader.com/chicago/sons-and-fathers-of- sons/Content?oid=871965 Category:Theatres in Chicago Category:Art museums in Illinois Category:1971 establishments in the United States Category:African- American theatre
title: ETA Creative Arts Foundation
